cause.description:
volunteer program that allows high school seniors to give back to their communtiy by assisting senior citiznes in daily chores. Activities may include, food shopping, lawn care, shoveling, and storm preparation
1. for more, contact Sivo or Shea
cause.mission: make the average day of a senior citizen a little easier and it turn make your life a little more complete
cause.name: Seniors Helping Seniors (S.H.S)
